thread.title: Govt extends deadline to file Income Tax returns to Sep 7
thread.title_full: Govt extends deadline to file Income Tax returns to Sep 7

title: Govt extends deadline to file Income Tax returns to Sep 7
text:
| Updated: Sep 02, 2015 18:24 IST 
The government, on Wednesday, extended the last date for filing Income Tax return to September 07, a week more than its initial deadline of August 31. 
"Due date for filing Income Tax return extended till 7th Sep, 2015," the finance ministry said in a tweet. 
Earlier, the Income Tax department had extended the last date for filing I-T returns by residents of Gujarat to September 7, following disruption of normal life due to agitation over the Patel reservation row. 
The tax department has notified a new set of ITR forms, including a three-page simplified one, for taxpayers to file their returns for assessment year 2015-16. 
The taxpayers based in India are just over 4 crore. 
The government aims to collect Rs 7.98 lakh crore in direct taxes in the current financial year.
